actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to extend from 28 days to 42 days the period immediately preceding an election during which mass mailing of franked mail by a Member or Member-elect of the Congress is prohibited.

summary.text: Provides for the extension, from twenty-eight days to forty-five days, of the period immediately preceding an election during which mass mailing of franked mail by a Member or Member-elect of the Congress is prohibited. (Amends 39 U.S.C. 3210 (a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to extend from 28 days to 42 days the period immediately preceding an election during which mass mailing of franked mail by a Member or Member-elect of the Congress is prohibited.
